-- | Fetch exchange rates from OpenExchangeRates.org
--   
--   This package wraps up the process of fetching exchange rates from
--   OpenExchangeRates.org. You will need an AppID.
@package openexchangerates
@version 0.1.0.0

module Currency.OpenExchangeRates

-- | Fetch exchange rates from OpenExchangeRates.org
fetchRates :: String -> EitherT ConnError IO (Rates Currency Double)
instance FromJSON OERs
